objects.description: [Industroyer](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0001)contained a module which leveraged a vulnerability in the Siemens SIPROTEC relays (CVE-2015-5374) to create a Denial of Service against automated protective relays.(Citation: Dragos CRASHOVERRIDE October 2018)

external_references.description: Dragos. (2018, October 12). Anatomy of an Attack: Detecting and Defeating CRASHOVERRIDE. Retrieved October 14, 2019.
